artist: Christoffel Jegher; After Peter Paul Rubens
creditline: Gift of funds from Ruth and Bruce Dayton, Beverly N. Grossman, Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison, Sheila Morgan, Kaywin Feldman and Jim Lutz, Al and Kathy Lenzmeier, Barbara H. Steiner, and thirty-six additional donors
description: two men fighting; Hercules pressing his PR foot on Discord reclining in a foreshortened pose; Hercules raises a club over his head; putti flying above Hercules places a laurel wreath over his head; Hercules wears lion's skin; Discord has snakes in his hair and holds a snake in his PL hand; received framed and glazed in 17th-century frame
marks:
Inscription

in the print, LRC: [P. P. Rub. deli
title: Hercules Triumphant over Discord
